PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CommunicationsApplianceTypeTelecommand
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to a telecommand. This property set is applied to a type or occurrence of IfcCommunicationsAppliance with predefined type TELECOMMAND.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfWorkstations
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the types or purposes of workstations and their number in the equipment. The defined purpose can be e.g. 'Diagnostic and maintenance', 'Traffic and electric traction', etc.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfCPUs
PropertyDef.Definition: The number of CPUs used by the equipment.
